name: Hucklebuck
additionalNotes:
HUCKLEBUCK Habano!

aka: Harvest #1

Yes.  Hucklebuck.  A great Cuban Seed wrapper. B-E-A ...utiful cigar.  You will love it.  Dominican and Nicaraguan filler.  Dominican binder.  Just a splendid cigar with a "mountain folk" name.  

It's a whole new "flavor" profile for Flatbed Cigar Co. Our PANACEA Red label (habano) has a Cuban seed binder, but the wrapper is a Brazilian maduro.  The HUCKLEBUCK Habano is a Cuban seed wrapper.  The "Buck" is a strong cigar compared to the PANACEA Red.  Smokey, nutty, earthy, with a hint of maple.

Full Body, and lots of smoke from this 6x52 Toro.
